vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
καταπίμπρημι,
future -πρήσω [Refs 2nd c.AD+]: perfect -πέπρηκα [Refs]:— burn to ashes, [Refs 1st c.AD+] —passive, [Refs 2nd c.BC+] (nisi to be read -πτισθέντας).
vocabInfos.shortDef: burn to ashes, destroy by fire (<ref='2Pe.2.6'>2PE.2:6</ref> - variant P72*)
vocabInfos.mediumDef: burn to ashes, destroy by fire (<ref='2Pe.2.6'>2PE.2:6</ref> - variant P72*)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: incinerar, destruido por el fuego (2PE.2:6 - algunos manuscritos)
